mapper.select: select * from shop_review where review_status='Y' AND SHOP_NO = #{shopNo} order by review_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into shop_review values(seq_rno.nextval, #{reviewContents}, sysdate, #{reviewScore}, #{shopNo}, #{memberId},#{originalFilename}, #{renameFilename}, default)
insert into review_reply values(#{reviewNo}, #{replyContent}, #{memberId}, sysdate, default)
mapper.select: select * from review_reply join shop_review using(review_No) where review_no = #{reviewNo}
